original_text: For the king of Babylon will stop at the fork in the road, at the junction of the two roads, to seek an omen: He will cast lots with arrows, he will consult his idols, he will examine the liver.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕이 갈랫길 곧 두 길 어귀에 서서 점을 치되 화살들을 흔들어 우상에게 묻고 희생제물의 간을 살펴서

sentences.original_text: For the king of Babylon will stop at the fork in the road
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕이 길의 갈림길에서 멈출 것이니

sentences.original_text: at the junction of the two roads
He will cast lots with arrows
